name: .HBM
summary: Learn about .HBM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an HBM file in Hard Bullet (Windows). To do so:
Use MelonLoader to install the Hard Bullet Modding Framework (HBMF) and Custom Maps mods for Hard Bullet.
Place your HBM file in Hard Bullet's UserData/â€‹CustomMaps directory.
The map your HBM file contains will then be selectable in-game.
